19namespace ZXing {
20
21class DetectorResult;
22class BitMatrix;
23
24namespace QRCode {
25
26/**
27* <p>Encapsulates logic that can detect a QR Code in an image, even if the QR Code
28* is rotated or skewed, or partially obscured.</p>
29*
30* @author Sean Owen
31*/
32class Detector
33{
34public:
35 /**
36 * <p>Detects a QR Code in an image.</p>
37 *
38 * @param hints optional hints to detector
39 * @return {@link DetectorResult} encapsulating results of detecting a QR Code
40 * @throws NotFoundException if QR Code cannot be found
41 * @throws FormatException if a QR Code cannot be decoded
42 */
43 static DetectorResult Detect(const BitMatrix& image, bool tryHarder, bool isPure);
44};
45
46} // QRCode
47} // ZXing
48
